relation: The tuition at Broward is not as expensive as that of many universities. Also, the things they sell are affordable for the student on a budget.
There are many activities to get into, such as: sports, clubs & organizations, volunteering, and many more.
The cafeterias have both great healthy foods and great comfort food for the students and staff.
Attend class on time and every time. Do the required work necessary. Keep positive and do your best.
Broward is a great college with great opportunities. Its not as stressful as many universities can be. Has the best teachers that will take out their time to aid in student success.
